string::operator std::string_view

Convert to a std::string_view referring to the string.

Synopsis 
operator std::string_view() const;
Description

Returns a string view to the underlying character string. The size of the view does not include the null terminator. This overload is not defined when either BOOST_JSON_STANDALONE or BOOST_NO_CXX17_HDR_STRING_VIEW is defined.

Complexity

Constant.
